Short Desc: Description: The defines in this file serves as documentation for families of functions, where the specific instance of '?' can be d, i, p, rgb_d, rgb_i, rgb_uc, rgb_ui, uc, ui, vfield2D_d, vfield2D_i vfield3D_d, vfield3D_i. Notes: Not to be complled separately
